name: Cuboix Run
description:
It is like a endless runner. Teleportors in green color helps to teleport between platforms. But remember one thing, teleportors are non trust worthy like your ....🤫🤫, sometimes they have your back and sometime they backstabs you. So take a lift of teleportor at your own risk. ☠️

Make your own Hi-score, lets see how far you can go. 😎

Enjoy the game. Peace out ✌
